name: Eggcelent
description:
This is a small game made for Godot Wild Jam #28 on the theme "Egg".

I unfortunately didn't have an artist with me so I was stuck with my incapacity to create something that I like to look at! :)

This is also my first 3D game which was possible because GWJ lasts for a week so I had time to learn a bit. Lots of fun and Godot is definitely a pleasure to work with!

This game is heavily inspired by Overcooked

WARNING: the web export doesn't seem to work (I suppose I messed up the upload format) but the windows version works fine! (I couldn't test mac & linux exports, sorry)
